languages.text: "Когда изменники узнают о грядущем возмездии, это заставит их нервничать. Ошибиться. Выдать себя".

traits.locale_text: "Когда изменники узнают о грядущем возмездии, это заставит их нервничать. Ошибиться. Выдать себя".

languages.text: "When the renegades hear of the coming retribution, it will make them nervous. Prone to mistakes. Likely to give themselves away."
languages.original_text: "Когда изменники узнают о грядущем возмездии, это заставит их нервничать. Ошибиться. Выдать себя".

traits.locale_text: "When the renegades hear of the coming retribution, it will make them nervous. Prone to mistakes. Likely to give themselves away."
"When the renegades hear of the coming retribution, it will make them nervous. Prone to mistakes. Likely to give themselves away."
"When the renegades hear of the coming retribution, it will make them nervous. Prone to mistakes. Likely to give themselves away."
"When the renegades hear of the coming retribution, it will make them nervous. Prone to mistakes. Likely to give themselves away."
"When the renegades hear of the coming retribution, it will make them nervous. Prone to mistakes. Likely to give themselves away."
"When the renegades hear of the coming retribution, it will make them nervous. Prone to mistakes. Likely to give themselves away."

languages.text: "Wenn die Abtrünnigen von der kommenden Vergeltung hören, wird sie das nervös machen. Sie werden Fehler begehen. Sie werden sich verraten."
languages.original_text: "When the renegades hear of the coming retribution, it will make them nervous. Prone to mistakes. Likely to give themselves away."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn die Abtrünnigen von der kommenden Vergeltung hören, wird sie das nervös machen. Sie werden Fehler begehen. Sie werden sich verraten."

languages.text: «Cuando los renegados oigan que la retribución se acerca, se pondrán nerviosos. Cometerán errores. Se delatarán».
languages.original_text: "When the renegades hear of the coming retribution, it will make them nervous. Prone to mistakes. Likely to give themselves away."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando los renegados oigan que la retribución se acerca, se pondrán nerviosos. Cometerán errores. Se delatarán».

languages.text: 「反逆者どもが報復の知らせを聞けば、連中は不安になることだろう。ミスを犯しやすくなる。自ら投降してくる可能性がある」
languages.original_text: "When the renegades hear of the coming retribution, it will make them nervous. Prone to mistakes. Likely to give themselves away."

traits.locale_text: 「反逆者どもが報復の知らせを聞けば、連中は不安になることだろう。ミスを犯しやすくなる。自ら投降してくる可能性がある」

languages.text: “当那些叛乱分子意识到惩罚即将到来时，他们一定会非常紧张。紧张的人很容易犯错，可能会暴露他们的身份。”
languages.original_text: "When the renegades hear of the coming retribution, it will make them nervous. Prone to mistakes. Likely to give themselves away."

traits.locale_text: “当那些叛乱分子意识到惩罚即将到来时，他们一定会非常紧张。紧张的人很容易犯错，可能会暴露他们的身份。”

languages.text: « Lorsque les renégats entendront parler du châtiment à venir, ils deviendront nerveux. Ils seront plus enclins à commettre des erreurs et à se trahir. »
languages.original_text: "When the renegades hear of the coming retribution, it will make them nervous. Prone to mistakes. Likely to give themselves away."

traits.locale_text: « Lorsque les renégats entendront parler du châtiment à venir, ils deviendront nerveux. Ils seront plus enclins à commettre des erreurs et à se trahir. »

languages.text: "Hainler, yaklaşan intikamdan haberdar olduklarında sinirleri de gerilecek. Hata yapmaya meyilli olacaklar. Kendilerini ele vermeleri muhtemel."
languages.original_text: "When the renegades hear of the coming retribution, it will make them nervous. Prone to mistakes. Likely to give themselves away."
